text: Aleksander Arendt (6 December 1912, Będargowo - 2002) was an activist of the Kashubians and Pomeranians (ethnic groups in northern Poland). He was the president of Kashubian-Pomeranian Association in years 1956–1959. Category:1912 births Category:2002 deaths Category:People from Wejherowo County Category:Polish politicians Category:Pomeranian Griffin members Category:People from West Prussia
title: Aleksander Arendt
